description: Jane is a high-school student who enjoys collaborating with classmates and regularly chats with friends on Slack. She is currently participating in an Environmental Science project to build a sustainable garden on campus.
relationship: David is Jane’s father and is away on a business trip but keeps in touch with her via Slack. Emily is Jane’s close friend who confides in her. Mr. Thompson is Jane’s Environmental Science teacher overseeing the sustainable-garden project, which is organized by the school’s Green Earth Club.
